languages.text: И сделалось чудо. Бог-Император послал своего защитника, наперсника своего и десницу свою — Вольного Торговца из благословенной династии фон Валанциус, да пребудут они во свету благодати Его.
And a miracle came to pass. The God-Emperor sent His champion, His confidant, His right hand — the Rogue Trader of the blessed House von Valancius, may the light of His grace remain upon it forever.
languages.original_text: И сделалось чудо. Бог-Император послал своего защитника, наперсника своего и десницу свою — Вольного Торговца из благословенной династии фон Валанциус, да пребудут они во свету благодати Его.

traits.locale_text: And a miracle came to pass. The God-Emperor sent His champion, His confidant, His right hand – a Rogue Trader of the blessed House von Valancius, may the light of His grace remain upon it forever.
And a miracle came to pass. The God-Emperor sent His champion, His confidant, His right hand – a Rogue Trader of the blessed House von Valancius, may the light of His grace remain upon it forever.

And a miracle came to pass. The God-Emperor sent His champion, His confidant, His right hand — the Rogue Trader of the blessed House von Valancius, may the light of His grace remain upon it forever.

languages.text: Y se obró un milagro. El Dios Emperador envió a un{mf||a} campe{mf|ón|ona}, un{mf||a} emisari{mf|o|a}: {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente de la noble casa von Valancius, que Su luz nunca la abandone.
languages.original_text: And a miracle came to pass. The God-Emperor sent His champion, His confidant, His right hand — the Rogue Trader of the blessed House von Valancius, may the light of His grace remain upon it forever.

traits.locale_text: Y se obró un milagro. El Dios Emperador envió a un{mf||a} campe{mf|ón|ona}, un{mf||a} emisari{mf|o|a}: {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente de la noble casa von Valancius, que Su luz nunca la abandone.

languages.text: 这个时候，奇迹降临了。神皇派来了祂的勇士、祂的使者、祂的心腹——来自受祝福的冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人。愿祂的恩典永远照耀这位勇士。
languages.original_text: And a miracle came to pass. The God-Emperor sent His champion, His confidant, His right hand — the Rogue Trader of the blessed House von Valancius, may the light of His grace remain upon it forever.

traits.locale_text: 这个时候，奇迹降临了。神皇派来了祂的勇士、祂的使者、祂的心腹——来自受祝福的冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人。愿祂的恩典永远照耀这位勇士。

languages.text: そして奇跡が起こる。神帝陛下は、陛下の戦士であり、忠臣であり、右腕である、祝福されしフォン・ヴァランシウス家の自由開拓者を遣わせた。主の恩寵の光が永遠に残るようにと。
languages.original_text: And a miracle came to pass. The God-Emperor sent His champion, His confidant, His right hand — the Rogue Trader of the blessed House von Valancius, may the light of His grace remain upon it forever.

traits.locale_text: そして奇跡が起こる。神帝陛下は、陛下の戦士であり、忠臣であり、右腕である、祝福されしフォン・ヴァランシウス家の自由開拓者を遣わせた。主の恩寵の光が永遠に残るようにと。

languages.text: Und dann geschah ein Wunder. Der Gottimperator schickte {mf|Seinen Streiter, Seinen Vertrauten, Seine rechte Hand – den Freihändler|Seine Streiterin, Seine Vertraute, Seine rechte Hand – die Freihändlerin} des gesegneten Hauses von Valancius, möge das Licht Seiner Gunst es auf ewig bescheinen.
languages.original_text: And a miracle came to pass. The God-Emperor sent His champion, His confidant, His right hand — the Rogue Trader of the blessed House von Valancius, may the light of His grace remain upon it forever.

traits.locale_text: Und dann geschah ein Wunder. Der Gottimperator schickte {mf|Seinen Streiter, Seinen Vertrauten, Seine rechte Hand – den Freihändler|Seine Streiterin, Seine Vertraute, Seine rechte Hand – die Freihändlerin} des gesegneten Hauses von Valancius, möge das Licht Seiner Gunst es auf ewig bescheinen.

languages.text: C'est alors qu'un miracle se produit. L'Empereur-Dieu envoie {mf|son champion, son confident|sa championne, sa confidente}, son bras droit : {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de la sainte maison von Valancius, puisse Sa grâce l'illuminer à jamais.
languages.original_text: And a miracle came to pass. The God-Emperor sent His champion, His confidant, His right hand — the Rogue Trader of the blessed House von Valancius, may the light of His grace remain upon it forever.

traits.locale_text: C'est alors qu'un miracle se produit. L'Empereur-Dieu envoie {mf|son champion, son confident|sa championne, sa confidente}, son bras droit : {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de la sainte maison von Valancius, puisse Sa grâce l'illuminer à jamais.

languages.text: Bir mucize gerçekleşti. Tanrı İmparator; müdafisini, sırdaşını, sağ kolunu, yani kutsanmış von Valancius Hanesi'nin Hür Tacir'ini gönderdi. O'nun lütfunun ışığı her daim üzerinde olsun.
languages.original_text: And a miracle came to pass. The God-Emperor sent His champion, His confidant, His right hand — the Rogue Trader of the blessed House von Valancius, may the light of His grace remain upon it forever.

traits.locale_text: Bir mucize gerçekleşti. Tanrı İmparator; şampiyonunu, sırdaşını, sağ kolunu, yani kutsanmış von Valancius Hanesi'nin Hür Tacir'ini gönderdi. O'nun lütfunun ışığı her daim üzerinde olsun.
